# VSCode AI Rules for Sangsom Mini-Me

This directory contains AI behavior rules for code generation and development.

## Rule Files

Rules from `.cursor/rules/` are being migrated here for VSCode compatibility.

### Structure

```
.vscode/rules/
├── core-rules/           # Project-wide guidelines
├── blender-rules/        # Blender Python standards
├── educational-rules/    # Game design principles
└── character-rules/      # Character system rules
```

## Usage

VSCode Copilot and other AI tools will reference these rules when generating code for this project.

See `.cursor/rules/` for the current rule implementations being migrated.
